articles.description: Follow live text updates from the second Test of Scotland's summer tour, against the United States in Washington DC.
articles.title: Summer tour: USA v Scotland - live text - BBC Sport

articles.description: England will appear in a second consecutive European Championship final on Sunday when they take on Spain.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Gareth Southgate says England reaching final feels 'normal'

articles.description: Novak Djokovic proves too good for Italian underdog Lorenzo Musetti to reach the Wimbledon final and set up a rematch against reigning champion Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Novak Djokovic to play Carlos Alcaraz in men's final

articles.description: The rugby players, who deny rape, are accused of attacking a woman in a hotel room after an international match.
articles.title: France rugby players charged with raping woman in Argentina

articles.description: James Anderson says he would like to be remembered as a “decent” bowler after he ends his legendary England career with victory over West Indies.
articles.title: James Anderson on his legacy after England beat West Indies

articles.description: Jadon Sancho returns to training with Manchester United following a meeting with manager Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: Jadon Sancho: Winger returns to Manchester United training after Erik ten Hag meeting

articles.description: There will be another new name etched on the Venus Rosewater Dish on Saturday as Jasmine Paolini faces Barbora Krejcikova in the Wimbledon final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 women's final: Jasmine Paolini faces Barbora Krejcikova in showpiece

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from England v Republic of Ireland in the Uefa European Championships qualifier from Carrow Road.
articles.title: England v Republic of Ireland LIVE - Score, live text and radio

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate tells BBC sports editor Dan Roan that "it's a little bit more normal for us" to reach a final of a major tournament after setting up a second consecutive Euro final appearance.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Reaching final 'feels a little bit more normal' - Southgate

articles.description: Watch and follow live text and video coverage of Malta v Northern Ireland in the UEFA Women's Euro 2025 qualifiers at the Centenary Stadium in Attard, Malta.
articles.title: Malta vs Northern Ireland: UEFA Women's Championship Qualification - BBC Sport
